label: ball
caption: A playful black and brown dog runs across the lush green grass, its tail wagging enthusiastically as it chases after a bright red rubber ball. The sun casts a warm glow over the scene, illuminating the delicate blades of grass swaying gently in the breeze. As the dog leaps to catch the ball, its paws barely graze its surface, sending it soaring back into the air once more.
